website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Invicto Fresh is a cleat that is designed to dominate the indoor playing field. With these cleats, players can accelerate their pace and deliver maximum performance. Although manufactured in the traditional Puma design, the brand made a few tweaks to the material resulting in a breathable and lightweight cleat that doesn't sacrifice comfort. This cleat will allow wearers to execute cuts and keep a clean and close feel on the ball.
pros: The Puma Invicto Fresh received much praise from many reviewers for being a great looking cleat
Based on the experience of some wearers, these indoor cleats are flexible
A lot admired the comfortable feel of the cleat
Aside from being a good indoor cleat, many users found it to be suitable for casual wear, as well
Some Puma enthusiasts loved the barefoot feel of the cleat owing to its incredibly thin shell
Players were pleased with the lightweight construction of this indoor cleat
Comments from a few testers favored the color combination of the cleat
A few individuals who tried the cleat were impressed with the good cushioning it offered
Several testers observed that the cleat was quick to break in
cons: Some buyers were disappointed with the cleat’s sizing which runs quite small
A user disliked the inscription on these soccer cleats, adding that it looked like a dirt mark
To a few users, the cleat's laces were too short for their liking
A common observation from some wearers was the narrow fit of the cleat
One commenter was discouraged that the sole easily separated from the cleat

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers looks pretty nice only during the first 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers looks pretty nice only during the first 2 weeks. This was really poorly made by Puma. The fluorescent blue is like a sticker or something glue on top of the fibers. Once that get wet forget about it, will start to peel off. You can't wash this because you will completely lose the colors on top. If you will never be in a rain and use it for indoor only, go for it. If you go out and it gets wet or dirty forget about your good looking sneakers, FOREVER.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Rodriguez Molina

customer_reviews.title: Toooooooooooo Narrow!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking but horrible size fitting. I'm a 12 been a 12 for the last 13 years and this damn thing is so skinny it feels like I'm wearing a size 9. The length is fine but the width is absolutely horrible. Now I gotta sell this damn thing cause I live in Belize and it's gonna be pin in the ass to get it bk.
customer_reviews.author: Hezron

customer_reviews.title: Who knew indoor soccer shoes can be converted to Swing dance shoes...now we all do ;)
customer_reviews.text: Very cool shoes. I added suede to these and they are now my West Coast Swing dance shoes :)
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: These pair of Pumas are the best ever created it
customer_reviews.text: These pair of Pumas are the best ever created it, I love the way it's been made, very comfortable, and if you have a touch with the ball these pairs are made for you, overall these are the best shoes in the market in my opinion, I would recommend this to any one, specially for people that loves football (soccer) these are just incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto L. Zanabria

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight shoe for table tennis
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and I tried my coaches mens size 10' on and then bought a 10.5 and put in light arch supports. Perfect indoor court shoe. I never wear them off court, just when I am playing and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Almost great.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color combination. Do not like the inscription on the top of each shoe just out of sight on this picture. Inscription looks like a dirt mark. Whoever came up with that idea needs to seek new ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great for Martial Arts too!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these in black as a martial arts shoe for my son. They have the right look, but more importantly, the flexibility, light weight, indoor focused sole, and quality build make this a great shoe for martial arts.
customer_reviews.author: SaidWhatWhen

customer_reviews.title: We purchased these for indoor soccer, my son has ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for indoor soccer, my son has had 3 practices and 1 game and the toe has already come apart from the sole of the shoe. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: I like Puma's and always seem to be consistent with size
customer_reviews.text: Sole separated from the rest of shoe within the first month of wearing. I like Puma's and always seem to be consistent with size, but I wouldn't recommend this style due to quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Fits great just had to get go about a half size bigger to get the right fit for me
customer_reviews.text: I started wearing it yesterday at the academy session and it felt great ..... I would actually like to get one that is an astro turf shoe but I can't find it in the same colour the other colours are not my choice. It looks good too pleased with it so far ......
customer_reviews.author: Anuoluwua Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Show was too big despite getting the right size. gave me blisters and am returning it now sucks I have to pay $10+ in shipping for a shoe that obviously isn't measured/labeled correctly
customer_reviews.author: Gal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe. Great for indoor and outdoor turf soccer. Is not a good idea to use it on grass but does a good job on dry grass. Used it for casual wear as well.
customer_reviews.author: Manoj

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes hot color
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I am a Puma enthusiast. These are comfortable for walking around and fit well. Color is blinding!
customer_reviews.author: Stogie

customer_reviews.title: 9/10 Indoor Soccer Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good soccer shoes, but definitely for indoor and definitely for persons who like to play as close to barefoot as possible (like me) -- the shell is incredibly thin, so much so that it barely feels like you're wearing a shoe at all. And a little narrow. I typically wear between a 10.5 (soccer, running) and 11 (dress), and the perfect size for this would be a 11.5.
customer_reviews.author: A Andre Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Got these for about $30. Worked great and feel great for indoor soccer. Breathable material and good fit. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: NCRD

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My son wears these. He has gone through 4 pair. They don't stand up too well to a Parkour, but are great looking!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: shoes
customer_reviews.text: fit snugly... Priced a bit high but they are decent shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great-looking shoes, but they're extremely narrow—a problem I find with most PUMA shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: These do not run small like Puma turf shoes do
customer_reviews.text: These do not run small like Puma turf shoes do. These flats are true to size, much like a running shoe. The same size in Puma turfs would fit very snugly, like a soccer cleat would.
customer_reviews.author: pshrop

customer_reviews.title: Sharp everyday tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and he really likes them. Great everyday shoe and comfortable. No complaints so far from my son.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers are comfortable, light. In sneakers it is comfortable to play for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksej

customer_reviews.title: They look cool, although they don't feel expensive
customer_reviews.text: They look cool, although they don't feel expensive...and they aren't. Very nice low profile shoe, I use it in the weight room, not for indoor soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Batistuta

customer_reviews.title: but extremely comfortable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: It fit about 1/2 large, but extremely comfortable and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Voltz

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Warrior Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Competed in my first Ultimate Backyard Warrior ninja competition in these and they worked GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Mcelvy

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes so far
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes so far. Comfortable and stylish. I have wide feet so had to loosen the laces a little more than usual but nothing to worry.
customer_reviews.author: SFCali49ers

customer_reviews.title: Better Heal = 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I would have liked more cushion on the heal.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Torres Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes but run slightly narrow. Length as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. I give it 4.5 stars because it fit a bit narrow but not uncomfortably so. The quality has been outstanding so far (about 8 indoor games worth). Hopefully they keep this style around because I'll buy again once these break down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe and my son loves it playing indoor soccer ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe and my son loves it playing indoor soccer with it. Looks like it runs small and we have to order half an inch bigger.
customer_reviews.author: U Balasubramanian

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super light, super fit...... But laces are too short. Easy fix
customer_reviews.author: Fergsgecko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: He loved them perfect indoor soccer shoe and with the bright sole I never loose site of him on the court...
customer_reviews.author: Sally McClimans

customer_reviews.title: they fit me perfect id recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are not that narrow how people describe them, they are soccer shoes anyways. Very thin and flexible material , they fit me perfect id recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My brother love them and they are perfect for soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: It has great cushioning and fits just as expected
customer_reviews.text: It has great cushioning and fits just as expected. The upper half though feels and looks a little too much like a thick vinyl bag.
customer_reviews.author: Danijuan

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a gift to my son. He loved them - Loved the color and the fit for his very large feet
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and a very comfortable fit on the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and a very comfortable fit on the first time wear, can't even imagine when I break them in how they will feel. Great item, especially for its price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are so cool! nice fit, nice quality, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lenka C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoe, use these as my daily walkers and occasionally for a run. Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: side 10 m like 8
customer_reviews.text: Its no red its almost PINK, side 10 m like 8
customer_reviews.author: Oscar marion-landais

customer_reviews.title: too large
customer_reviews.text: I want to return the product, and replaced a smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Noura

customer_reviews.title: My Husband LOVED these shoes they fit great and the material is ...
customer_reviews.text: My Husband LOVED these shoes they fit great and the material is very comfortable. He plays indoor soccer at least once a week in the winter time and has gone through a great deal of shoes. The style and fit on these where defiantly up to his standards. The only issue we had was that the shoes where a little low on the ankle so my husband tore out in sole in side and they fit PERFECT. As well they came a lot earlier then expected
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Buy two sizes. Your size and half larger. Keep the one that fits you. Return the other.
customer_reviews.text: I was told Puma runs tight and need to get half size bigger. A few years back, that was the case. 10.5 was too small. This in an 11 was too big inside. For the price..you can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: anointed_alien

customer_reviews.title: Still no better price for what i got them
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot of puma products... for my indoor shoes, I was expecting something of a little small to a true size. To my surprise, they came little big , but not that big that make me want to return them. Still no better price for what i got them...
customer_reviews.author: Cuong Tuan Tran

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's supposed to be my normal size, yet far too small for me. I can't use them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Kendall

customer_reviews.title: He has a narrow foot so we will have to order something else in the near future but the Pumas are beautiful and very well made
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my grandson but too big ! He has a narrow foot so we will have to order something else in the near future but the Pumas are beautiful and very well made !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they are very comfortable. I have overpronation/flat feet issues
customer_reviews.text: They run a little small, but they are very comfortable. I have overpronation/flat feet issues, so I did need to add in some support, but that's typical of all shoes I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

product_meta.title: Puma Mens Invicto Fresh-M Invicto Fresh
product_meta.description: The invicto fresh is an innovative performance boot targeting the serious futsala player. The new mesh upper material with a special coating ensures optimal ventilation and keeps the temperature down, while a synthetic overlay provides support and enhances durability. The low-profile and full gum rubber outsole provides excellent grip and brings the player low to the ground. The strong graphics and striking colours gives the product a fresh and modern look.
feature_bullets: Low-profile lightweight sneaker in textured mesh featuring lace-up closure, contrast padded collar, and Formstrip logoing
